featuremodel.name: covnonproj
featuremodel.feature: Merge3(InputColumn(XPOSTAG, Left[1]), InputColumn(XPOSTAG, Left[0]), InputColumn(XPOSTAG, Right[0]))

Merge3(InputColumn(XPOSTAG, Right[1]), InputColumn(XPOSTAG, Right[2]), InputColumn(XPOSTAG, Right[3]))
